column4: hello... can anyone teach me on how to install theme in ibuntu??
in the lower right there is a button labeled Install...
one second, I'll send you a screenshot, ok?
the default window manager is metacity, so look at metcaity themes
it's the 5th option down on the left menu
go back into appearance, go to the last tab, and choose the bottom option
go back into appearance, go to the last tab, and choose the bottom option
nice capslock.  If you did that, compiz will be enabled, just hit OK.  If you want further config install ccsm, the Compiz Advanced Settings Manager
you'll need ccsm, as I said earlier
then you can run it from system->preferences->Advanced Desktop Effects Settings
for future reference, you can type part of a name in and then use tab for autocomplete, or press tab twice to see all your options
